tye2-vscode.activityBar.tye2-view.title: Tye2
tye2-vscode.commands.refreshEntry.title: Refresh
tye2-vscode.commands.debugAll.title: Attach
tye2-vscode.commands.browseService.title: Browse
tye2-vscode.commands.attachService.title: Attach
tye2-vscode.commands.attachReplica.title: Attach
tye2-vscode.commands.showLogs.title: Logs
tye2-vscode.configuration.paths.tye2Path: The full path to the Tye2 binary.
tye2-vscode.debuggers.tye2.properties.ap: The name of the Tye2 application whose services to debug.
tye2-vscode.debuggers.tye2.properties.se: The subset of services to debug else, if unspecified, all services are debuggged.
tye2-vscode.debuggers.tye2.properties.wa: Watches for code changes for all projects and reconnects the debugger.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.ap: The name of the Tye2 application being run.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.de: Wait for debugger attach to specific service.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.dt: Write distributed traces to the specified tracing provider.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.fr: The target framework hint to use for all cross-targeting projects with multiple TFMs. This value must be a valid target framework for each individual cross-targeting project.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.lo: Write structured application logs to the specified log provider.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.me: Write metrics to the specified metrics provider.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.pa: A file or directory, and can be a .yaml, .sln, or project file.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.po: The port to run control plane on.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.ta: Filter the group of running services by tag.
tye2-vscode.tasks.tye2-run.properties.wa: Watches for code changes for all projects.
tye2-vscode.views.help.name: Help and Feedback
tye2-vscode.views.services.contents.notI:
A compatible version of Tye2 has not been found. You may need to install a more recent version.
[Install Latest Tye2](command:tye2-vscode.commands.help.installTye2)
tye2-vscode.views.services.name: Tye2 Applications
